product_name: REI Ruby Tree T-Shirt - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Ruby Tree T-shirt unites stripy style with a cozy blend of cotton and polyester. It's a perfect cold-weather layer under a coat or a cute standalone top in mild weather. Cotton/polyester blend is breathable and easy to care for. Raglan sleeves provide non-binding range of motion. Snap placket at left side of neck makes it easy to pull overhead.
short_description: The REI Ruby Tree T-shirt unites stripy style with a cozy blend of cotton and polyester. It's a perfect cold-weather layer under a coat or a cute standalone top in mild weather.
